name: User is able to configure and trigger periodic builds as scheduled.
description: A User can enable the "Build periodically trigger" in a Freestyle project and that the build runs according to the specified schedule.
descriptionHtml: A User can enable the "Build periodically trigger" in a Freestyle project and that the build runs according to the specified schedule.
statusMessage:
XFAIL May fail due to non-reproducible concurrent builds locally.

assert 2 == 1

3.2 sec stable
Console output', 'freestyle-api-b0a0c174
#1
3.3 sec stable

steps.name: Go to the Freestyle project page by clicking project link.
Wait up to 60 seconds for the build to appear in the build history.
Wait for 'Builds' link to be visible
Go to the main page by clicking logo.
Navigate to "MainPage"
Go to the Build History page by clicking Build History button.
Get existing builds list.
Assert that only one build is displayed in the list.
